name: ATtiny85-Gameplay
description: Automated Wi-Fi credential extraction and Chrome password decryption using ATtiny85 microcontroller. This hardware security project demonstrates USB HID emulation for automated credential harvesting and PowerShell-based data extraction in controlled environments.

name: KingBOB Web Crawler
description: This Python script allows systematic browsing and extraction of links from websites up to a specified depth. It is ideal for SEO analysis, site audit, and exploring web structures.

name: QuoteNest
description: A personal quote journal application that allows you to collect, organize, and reflect on your favorite quotes with tagging, favorites, and search functionality.

name: Daily Personal Planner
description: Daily planner web application built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features include task management, calendar integration, and responsive design. Use this password : arafat69

name: E-commerce Backend
description: A robust e-commerce backend built with Node.js and TypeScript, featuring Express.js and Mongoose for database management.

name: Binary Exploitation Buffer Overflow Starter Code
description: A collection of Python scripts and exercises for practicing binary exploitation and buffer overflow techniques.

name: AES Crypto 256 Bits by KingBOB
description: Python scripts for encrypting and decrypting text files using the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) in Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode with a 256-bit key.
